report.title: MNHNL Transect Walk Direction Warning report
report.description: Lists closed top level samples which have not been downloaded, and which have a different walk direction to the previously entered top level sample on that location. Normally invoked from Reports and Downloads tab on the form.
report.query:
SELECT s1.id, l.name as location_name, s1.date_start, s1.date_end, s1.date_type FROM samples s1 INNER JOIN locations l ON l.id = s1.location_id INNER JOIN samples s2 ON s2.location_id = s1.location_id and s2.id = (select max(s3.id) from samples s3 where s3.location_id = s2.location_id and s3.id < s1.id) AND s2.deleted = FALSE AND s2.parent_id is null WHERE s1.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s1.deleted = FALSE AND s1.parent_id is null AND EXISTS (select sav.id from sample_attribute_values sav where sav.sample_id = s1.id and sav.deleted = FALSE and sav.sample_attribute_id = #closed_attr_id# and int_value = 1) AND EXISTS (select o.id from occurrences o, samples sc where o.sample_id = sc.id and sc.parent_id = s1.id and o.deleted = FALSE and o.downloaded_flag != 'F') AND (select int_value from sample_attribute_values sav where sav.sample_id = s1.id and sav.deleted = FALSE and sav.sample_attribute_id = #direction_attr_id#) != (select int_value from sample_attribute_values sav where sav.sample_id = s2.id and sav.deleted = FALSE and sav.sample_attribute_id = #direction_attr_id#)
#order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: direction_attr_id
param.display: Sample Attribute ID for Walk Direction:
param.description: ID of sample_attribute for walk direction

param.name: closed_attr_id
param.display: Sample Attribute ID for Closed flag:
param.description: ID of sample_attribute for sample closed flag
